entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near noon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:18 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
